comments.content:
Detailed Report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=5806921457205248

Project: libssh
Fuzzing Engine: libFuzzer
Fuzz Target: ssh_client_fuzzer
Job Type: libfuzzer_asan_libssh
Platform Id: linux

Crash Type: Heap-buffer-overflow WRITE {*}
Crash Address: 0x60300000a6e0
Crash State:
  explicit_bzero
  crypto_free
  ssh_disconnect
  
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: High

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_libssh&range=202005050240:202005080234

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5806921457205248

Issue filed automatically.

See https://google.github.io/oss-fuzz/advanced-topics/reproducing for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.
When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you need to contact the OSS-Fuzz team with a question, concern, or any other feedback, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues. Comments on individual Monorail issues are not monitored.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.
Internal tracking bug on libssh side: https://gitlab.com/libssh/libssh-mirror/-/issues/87

ClusterFuzz testcase 5806921457205248 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=libfuzzer_asan_libssh&range=202108260607:202108261318

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new

For the record, this was fixed in latest libssh-0.9.6, it was assigned a CVE-2021-3634. More information is available on the following links

https://www.libssh.org/2021/08/26/libssh-0-9-6-security-release/
https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2021-3634
https://gitlab.com/libssh/libssh-mirror/-/issues/87
https://gitlab.com/libssh/libssh-mirror/-/commit/f5211239f918acf405d104b200891ca58130e23e

This bug has been fixed. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot
